solution_line_template: There are {total_chips_in_bag} / {num_batches}= <<{total_chips_in_bag}/{num_batches}={chips_per_batch}>>{chips_per_batch} chips in a batch.
Thus, there are {chips_per_batch} / {chips_per_cookie} = <<{chips_per_batch}/{chips_per_cookie}={cookies_per_batch}>>{cookies_per_batch} cookies in a batch.
